akn:section.akn:heading: Submission of bill to involved advisory neighborhood commission.

akn:content.akn:p: The initiator of a proposal to name or rename a public space shall:
Prior to consideration by a committee of the Council of a bill to name or rename a public space, the Mayor shall provide the Council with the following:

Not less than 30 days prior to Council consideration of a bill to name or rename a public space in the District of Columbia, the Council shall submit a copy of the bill for review and comment to each Advisory Neighborhood Commission in which the public space is located.
